titleStmt.title: To Queen Mary: the humble salutation, and faithful greeting of the widow Whitrowe With a vvarning to the rulers of the earth, before the Day of the Lord breaks forth, that shall burn as an oven, and all the wicked, and all the ungodly shall be as stubble: the mouth of the Lord hath spoken it.
titleStmt.author: Whitrowe, Joan.

notesStmt.note: Signed at dated at end: Joan Whitrowe. Putney-Park, the 14th. of Decem. 1690.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
